__e: No, our agreement is whatever I say it is.
Yes, well, I'm not exactly sure of our arrangement yet.
You know that's not part of the deal.
I am aware of your fondness for power, so I imagine this arrangement is less than desirable for you.
You made the deal, shorty. Not me.
I had a deal with the General.
Yes, I know, we made our little deal with the universe, but...
I did make a deal with the new boss.
I've offered to go a step further, but it means we have to make a deal.
If he has done a deal with you, it's for the good of the cause, nothing else.
Your friend made a deal with me, and you are part of it.
They made a pact ten years ago to marry each other, only for him to find out that she's marrying you instead.
We made a deal, and we'll keep it.
And together, lthink, some sort of bargain was struck.
Now I have work to do, and I believe our deal is done.
All you need to do is tell me where they are then we'll have held up our end of the bargain.
Well, now that I've fulfilled my end of the bargain, I'm just wondering where you and I stand.
Why don't I come back when you think you can hold up your end of the deal?
But that won't stop me from killing you if you don't hold up your end of the deal.
I don't think either of us expected the other to keep up our end of the bargain.
